Burning Hammer looked at Nighlight now. WIth sad eyes and a confused look.
Zeni came out from behind Burning Hammer and stepped in front of him. Arrow
could be heard from outside.

Arrow: Open the shields! Come on, open them! Open them!!!

Burning Hammer eyes darted to the door.

Burning hammer: Shouldn't you open the shields?

His eyes quickly returned to Zeni. Zeni held out his hand to the serial
killer turned bounty hunter. Burning Hammer took his hand.

Burning Hammer: I killed my best friend, kid, I'm not so great, not great
like I thought I was. I killed him because there was a bounty on him. if
that tells how great I am.

Zeni: You can still be great.

Arrow: Open the damn door!

Arrow never let up, never stopped yelling until he got what he wanted...

----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 12:23 AM
Subject: Re: Dark returns...


> Nightlight:
>
> "I'm not in position to lie... I'm telling the true and I always have
> told it...What will we get if we lie? Nothing... Lamda was right when
> she said that we aren't gods to forgive easyly, Windlord doubted and
> I doubted too... I don't know what think Windlord, but I was starting
> to forget when you tried to destroy us..." said Nightlight who had
> now a double reason to be worried "I... I hoped that you and Lambda
> wanted join us after she... her wounds cured and after you recover
> the memorie... She come and said something like "I fired... " I can't
> remeber what else, I just liked help... I'd thought that if you
> didn't join us, we let you go and things continues like... like
> before that happen... If we had liked destroy you, we would nerver be
> here... "
